text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose

brought to you by let's store
podcast.com
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 78 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
precarious let's find out what it means
and how you can use it in your daily
conversation precarious what do you mean
by precarious have you ever felt you are
in a dangerous or an uncertain situation
the word precarious basically means
something that is risky or something
that is unstable when you do something
that involves a lot of uncertainty and
high risks it means you are doing
something that is precarious it also
means something that is barely hanging
and is likely to collapse or come down
crashing for example if you are an
adventurous person you might do
precarious things that means you
undertake activities that are risky or
unsafe most road accidents occur due to
intoxication
thus drinking and driving is always
precarious you are certainly risking
your life the stunt men always do
precarious stunts and risk their life to
earn a living as the word precarious
describes the situation or an act of
being risky and dangerous it is an
adjective
okay now that you know what precarious
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation example one due
to the precarious weather conditions all
the flights were canceled
example till the precarious drop in the
company's share prices at the stock
market put the management team in a
state of panic and worry example3 the
precarious tunnel on the highway
resulted in many accidents and is now
known as the death tunnel example for
despite the best medication given by the
doctor grandmother's health remained
precarious example 5 Sara knows that
modeling is not just a precarious
profession but also the short-lived one
still she is determined to pursue it
example 6 the use of mobile phone at the
fuel station is banned as it's very
precarious and may lead to an explosion
example 7 bikers usually indulge in
precarious racing for their passion of
riding example 8 stock trading is
considered as one of the most precarious
ways of making quick money due to the
instability of the share markets example
9 the window climber was hanging in a
precarious position on the outer wall
when his safety rope snapped example 10
the passers-by on the street applauded
the little girls precarious act of
walking on the strings
example 11 to earn his livelihood Shawn
does the precarious job of an undersea
diver that's the end of today's episode
have you ever indulged in any precarious
activity and how did you feel about it
kindly share your experiences in the
comment box below this video thank you
for watching us do watch all the
episodes of daily video vocabulary to
better your English language skills do
subscribe to our Channel and stay
updated with all the latest lessons I
will see you again tomorrow with a new

bye and take care
